featured.text: By sharing knowledge and information, the different sectors are able to come up with improved processing and handling, through which creation of various innovative products was made possible.
Green tea is dried but not fermented, and this shorter processing gives it a lighter flavor than black tea.
The most compelling support, however, comes from brain scans, which show that color processing areas in the brain light up when these people listen to certain words.

definition.en_def: The act of performing a series of operations on data or materials to achieve a desired result.
definition.example: The processing of the data took several hours.
